about_the_game:
Welcome to your medical practice with Medical Diagnostic Simulator, an immersive simulation where you play the role of a general practitioner. Start your professional adventure with common cases and progress to more complex medical challenges, requiring precise and thoughtful diagnoses.



Key Features:

Realistic Consultations: Receive patients with various symptoms and decide on the relevant exams to uncover the source of their ailments. Your ability to listen and analyze is crucial for your patients' well-being.

Professional Development: As your experience grows, cases become rarer and more complex. Each level passed is a recognition of your skill and ability to handle diverse medical situations.

Interactive Medical Glossary: Take advantage of a rich glossary to assist you in your diagnostics. This medical directory proves to be a valuable ally, enriching your knowledge and offering constant support throughout your career.

Medical Office Simulation: Manage aspects of your office, from patient reception to managing their follow-up. Patient retention and the reputation of your practice depend on your diagnostic and relational skills.

Immersion in Daily Medical Life: This game emphasizes the impact of every medical decision. Make informed decisions that directly influence the health and satisfaction of your patients, reflecting the reality of general practitioners.



Medical Diagnostic Simulator offers you more than a game; it accurately simulates the daily life of a doctor, highlighting the importance of communication, clinical judgment, and patient management. Prepare yourself for a rich experience full of personal and professional challenges.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or above
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Play as a general practitioner in this text-based medical simulation game. Consult, examine, and diagnose your patients in your own medical practice.

English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Italian*, Spanish - Latin America*
